java/liquibase/parser/xml/XMLChangeLogHandler.java

00001 package liquibase.parser.xml;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00005 import liquibase.FileOpener;
00006 import liquibase.change.*;
00007 import liquibase.change.custom.CustomChangeWrapper;
00008 import liquibase.exception.CustomChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException;
00010 import liquibase.exception.MigrationFailedException;
00011 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00012 import liquibase.parser.ChangeLogParser;
00013 import liquibase.preconditions.*;
00014 import liquibase.util.ObjectUtil;
00015 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00016 import org.xml.sax.Attributes;
00017 import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
00018 import org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler;
00019 
00020 import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
00021 import java.util.*;
00022 import java.util.regex.Pattern;
00023 import java.util.regex.Matcher;
00024 import java.util.logging.Level;
00025 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00026 import java.io.InputStream;
00027 
00028 class XMLChangeLogHandler extends DefaultHandler {
00029 
00030     protected Logger log;
00031 
00032     private DatabaseChangeLog databaseChangeLog;
00033     private Change change;
00034     private StringBuffer text;
00035     private Preconditions rootPrecondition;
00036     private Stack<PreconditionLogic> preconditionLogicStack = new Stack<PreconditionLogic>();
00037     private ChangeSet changeSet;
00038     private FileOpener fileOpener;
00039     private Precondition currentPrecondition;
00040 
00041     private Map<String, Object> changeLogParameters = new HashMap<String, Object>();
00042     private boolean inRollback = false;
00043 
00044 
00045     protected XMLChangeLogHandler(String physicalChangeLogLocation, FileOpener fileOpener, Map<String, Object> properties) {
00046         log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00047         this.fileOpener = fileOpener;
00048 
00049         databaseChangeLog = new DatabaseChangeLog(physicalChangeLogLocation);
00050         databaseChangeLog.setPhysicalFilePath(physicalChangeLogLocation);
00051 
00052         for (Map.Entry entry : System.getProperties().entrySet()) {
00053             changeLogParameters.put(entry.getKey().toString(), entry.getValue());
00054         }
00055 
00056         for (Map.Entry entry : properties.entrySet()) {
00057             changeLogParameters.put(entry.getKey().toString(), entry.getValue());
00058         }
00059     }
00060 
00061     public DatabaseChangeLog getDatabaseChangeLog() {
00062         return databaseChangeLog;
00063     }
00064 
00065     public void startElement(String uri, String localName, String qName, Attributes baseAttributes) throws SAXException {
00066         Attributes atts = new ExpandingAttributes(baseAttributes);
00067         try {
00068             if ("comment".equals(qName)) {
00069                 text = new StringBuffer();
00070             } else if ("validCheckSum".equals(qName)) {
00071                 text = new StringBuffer();
00072             } else if ("databaseChangeLog".equals(qName)) {
00073                 String version = uri.substring(uri.lastIndexOf("/") + 1);
00074                 if (!version.equals(XMLChangeLogParser.getSchemaVersion())) {
00075                     log.warning(databaseChangeLog.getPhysicalFilePath() + " is using schema version " + version + " rather than version " + XMLChangeLogParser.getSchemaVersion());
00076                 }
00077                 databaseChangeLog.setLogicalFilePath(atts.getValue("logicalFilePath"));
00078             } else if ("include".equals(qName)) {
00079                 String fileName = atts.getValue("file");
00080                 handleIncludedChangeLog(fileName);
00081             } else if (changeSet == null && "changeSet".equals(qName)) {
00082                 boolean alwaysRun = false;
00083                 boolean runOnChange = false;
00084                 if ("true".equalsIgnoreCase(atts.getValue("runAlways"))) {
00085                     alwaysRun = true;
00086                 }
00087                 if ("true".equalsIgnoreCase(atts.getValue("runOnChange"))) {
00088                     runOnChange = true;
00089                 }
00090                 changeSet = new ChangeSet(atts.getValue("id"),
00091                         atts.getValue("author"),
00092                         alwaysRun,
00093                         runOnChange,
00094                         databaseChangeLog.getFilePath(),
00095                         databaseChangeLog.getPhysicalFilePath(),
00096                         atts.getValue("context"),
00097                         atts.getValue("dbms"));
00098                 if (StringUtils.trimToNull(atts.getValue("failOnError")) != null) {
00099                     changeSet.setFailOnError(Boolean.parseBoolean(atts.getValue("failOnError")));
00100                 }
00101             } else if (changeSet != null && "rollback".equals(qName)) {
00102                 text = new StringBuffer();
00103                 String id = atts.getValue("changeSetId");
00104                 if (id != null) {
00105                     String path = atts.getValue("changeSetPath");
00106                     if (path == null) {
00107                         path = databaseChangeLog.getFilePath();
00108                     }
00109                     String author = atts.getValue("changeSetAuthor");
00110                     ChangeSet changeSet = databaseChangeLog.getChangeSet(path, author, id);
00111                     if (changeSet == null) {
00112                         throw new SAXException("Could not find changeSet to use for rollback: " + path + ":" + author + ":" + id);
00113                     } else {
00114                         for (Change change : changeSet.getChanges()) {
00115                             this.changeSet.addRollbackChange(change);
00116                         }
00117                     }
00118                 }
00119                 inRollback = true;
00120             } else if ("preConditions".equals(qName)) {
00121                 rootPrecondition = new Preconditions();
00122                 rootPrecondition.setOnFail(StringUtils.trimToNull(atts.getValue("onFail")));
00123                 rootPrecondition.setOnError(StringUtils.trimToNull(atts.getValue("onError")));
00124                 preconditionLogicStack.push(rootPrecondition);
00125             } else if (currentPrecondition != null && currentPrecondition instanceof CustomPreconditionWrapper && qName.equals("param")) {
00126                 ((CustomPreconditionWrapper) currentPrecondition).setParam(atts.getValue("name"), atts.getValue("value"));
00127             } else if (rootPrecondition != null) {
00128                 currentPrecondition = PreconditionFactory.getInstance().create(qName);
00129 
00130                 for (int i = 0; i < atts.getLength(); i++) {
00131                     String attributeName = atts.getQName(i);
00132                     String attributeValue = atts.getValue(i);
00133                     setProperty(currentPrecondition, attributeName, attributeValue);
00134                 }
00135                 preconditionLogicStack.peek().addNestedPrecondition(currentPrecondition);
00136 
00137                 if (currentPrecondition instanceof PreconditionLogic) {
00138                     preconditionLogicStack.push(((PreconditionLogic) currentPrecondition));
00139                 }
00140 
00141                 if ("sqlCheck".equals(qName)) {
00142                     text = new StringBuffer();
00143                 }
00144             } else if (changeSet != null && change == null) {
00145                 change = ChangeFactory.getInstance().create(qName);
00146                 change.setChangeSet(changeSet);
00147                 text = new StringBuffer();
00148                 if (change == null) {
00149                     throw new MigrationFailedException(changeSet, "Unknown change: " + qName);
00150                 }
00151                 change.setFileOpener(fileOpener);
00152                 if (change instanceof CustomChangeWrapper) {
00153                     ((CustomChangeWrapper) change).setClassLoader(fileOpener.toClassLoader());
00154                 }
00155                 for (int i = 0; i < atts.getLength(); i++) {
00156                     String attributeName = atts.getQName(i);
00157                     String attributeValue = atts.getValue(i);
00158                     setProperty(change, attributeName, attributeValue);
00159                 }
00160                 change.setUp();
00161             } else if (change != null && "column".equals(qName)) {
00162                 ColumnConfig column;
00163                 if (change instanceof LoadDataChange) {
00164                     column = new LoadDataColumnConfig();
00165                 } else {
00166                     column = new ColumnConfig();
00167                 }
00168                 for (int i = 0; i < atts.getLength(); i++) {
00169                     String attributeName = atts.getQName(i);
00170                     String attributeValue = atts.getValue(i);
00171                     setProperty(column, attributeName, attributeValue);
00172                 }
00173                 if (change instanceof ChangeWithColumns) {
00174                     ((ChangeWithColumns) change).addColumn(column);
00175                 } else {
00176                     throw new RuntimeException("Unexpected column tag for " + change.getClass().getName());
00177                 }
00178             } else if (change != null && "constraints".equals(qName)) {
00179                 ConstraintsConfig constraints = new ConstraintsConfig();
00180                 for (int i = 0; i < atts.getLength(); i++) {
00181                     String attributeName = atts.getQName(i);
00182                     String attributeValue = atts.getValue(i);
00183                     setProperty(constraints, attributeName, attributeValue);
00184                 }
00185                 ColumnConfig lastColumn;
00186                 if (change instanceof AddColumnChange) {
00187                     lastColumn = ((AddColumnChange) change).getLastColumn();
00188                 } else if (change instanceof CreateTableChange) {
00189                     lastColumn = ((CreateTableChange) change).getColumns().get(((CreateTableChange) change).getColumns().size() - 1);
00190                 } else if (change instanceof ModifyColumnChange) {
00191                     lastColumn = ((ModifyColumnChange) change).getColumns().get(((ModifyColumnChange) change).getColumns().size() - 1);
00192                 } else {
00193                     throw new RuntimeException("Unexpected change: " + change.getClass().getName());
00194                 }
00195                 lastColumn.setConstraints(constraints);
00196             } else if ("param".equals(qName)) {
00197                 if (change instanceof CustomChangeWrapper) {
00198                     ((CustomChangeWrapper) change).setParam(atts.getValue("name"), atts.getValue("value"));
00199                 } else {
00200                     throw new MigrationFailedException(changeSet, "'param' unexpected in " + qName);
00201                 }
00202             } else if ("where".equals(qName)) {
00203                 text = new StringBuffer();
00204             } else if ("property".equals(qName)) {
00205                 if (StringUtils.trimToNull(atts.getValue("file")) == null) {
00206                     this.setParameterValue(atts.getValue("name"), atts.getValue("value"));
00207                 } else {
00208                     Properties props = new Properties();
00209                     InputStream propertiesStream = fileOpener.getResourceAsStream(atts.getValue("file"));
00210                     if (propertiesStream == null) {
00211                         log.info("Could not open properties file " + atts.getValue("file"));
00212                     } else {
00213                         props.load(propertiesStream);
00214 
00215                         for (Map.Entry entry : props.entrySet()) {
00216                             this.setParameterValue(entry.getKey().toString(), entry.getValue().toString());
00217                         }
00218                     }
00219                 }
00220             } else if (change instanceof ExecuteShellCommandChange && "arg".equals(qName)) {
00221                 ((ExecuteShellCommandChange) change).addArg(atts.getValue("value"));
00222             } else {
00223                 throw new MigrationFailedException(changeSet, "Unexpected tag: " + qName);
00224             }
00225         } catch (Exception e) {
00226             log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error thrown as a SAXException: " + e.getMessage(), e);
00227             e.printStackTrace();
00228             throw new SAXException(e);
00229         }
00230     }
00231 
00232     protected void handleIncludedChangeLog(String fileName) throws LiquibaseException {
00233         DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(fileName, fileOpener);
00234         AndPrecondition preconditions = changeLog.getPreconditions();
00235         if (preconditions != null) {
00236             databaseChangeLog.getPreconditions().addNestedPrecondition(preconditions);
00237         }
00238         for (ChangeSet changeSet : changeLog.getChangeSets()) {
00239             databaseChangeLog.addChangeSet(changeSet);
00240         }
00241     }
00242 
00243     private void setProperty(Object object, String attributeName, String attributeValue) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, CustomChangeException {
00244         if (object instanceof CustomChangeWrapper) {
00245             if (attributeName.equals("class")) {
00246                 ((CustomChangeWrapper) object).setClass(expandExpressions(attributeValue));
00247             } else {
00248                 ((CustomChangeWrapper) object).setParam(attributeName, expandExpressions(attributeValue));
00249             }
00250         } else {
00251             ObjectUtil.setProperty(object, attributeName, expandExpressions(attributeValue));
00252         }
00253     }
00254 
00255     public void endElement(String uri, String localName, String qName) throws SAXException {
00256         String textString = null;
00257         if (text != null && text.length() > 0) {
00258             textString = expandExpressions(StringUtils.trimToNull(text.toString()));
00259         }
00260 
00261         try {
00262             if (rootPrecondition != null) {
00263                 if ("preConditions".equals(qName)) {
00264                     if (changeSet == null) {
00265                         databaseChangeLog.setPreconditions(rootPrecondition);
00266                         handlePreCondition(rootPrecondition);
00267                     } else {
00268                         changeSet.setPreconditions(rootPrecondition);
00269                     }
00270                     rootPrecondition = null;
00271                 } else if ("and".equals(qName)) {
00272                     preconditionLogicStack.pop();
00273                     currentPrecondition = null;
00274                 } else if ("or".equals(qName)) {
00275                     preconditionLogicStack.pop();
00276                     currentPrecondition = null;
00277                 } else if ("not".equals(qName)) {
00278                     preconditionLogicStack.pop();
00279                     currentPrecondition = null;
00280                 } else if (qName.equals("sqlCheck")) {
00281                     ((SqlPrecondition) currentPrecondition).setSql(textString);
00282                     currentPrecondition = null;
00283                 } else if (qName.equals("customPrecondition")) {
00284                     ((CustomPreconditionWrapper) currentPrecondition).setClassLoader(fileOpener.toClassLoader());
00285                 }
00286 
00287             } else if (changeSet != null && "rollback".equals(qName)) {
00288                 changeSet.addRollBackSQL(textString);
00289                 inRollback = false;
00290             } else if (change != null && change instanceof RawSQLChange && "comment".equals(qName)) {
00291                 ((RawSQLChange) change).setComments(textString);
00292                 text = new StringBuffer();
00293             } else if (change != null && "where".equals(qName)) {
00294                 if (change instanceof UpdateDataChange) {
00295                     ((UpdateDataChange) change).setWhereClause(textString);
00296                 } else if (change instanceof DeleteDataChange) {
00297                     ((DeleteDataChange) change).setWhereClause(textString);
00298                 } else {
00299                     throw new RuntimeException("Unexpected change type: " + change.getClass().getName());
00300                 }
00301                 text = new StringBuffer();
00302             } else if (change != null && change instanceof CreateProcedureChange && "comment".equals(qName)) {
00303                 ((CreateProcedureChange) change).setComments(textString);
00304                 text = new StringBuffer();
00305             } else if (changeSet != null && "comment".equals(qName)) {
00306                 changeSet.setComments(textString);
00307                 text = new StringBuffer();
00308             } else if (changeSet != null && "changeSet".equals(qName)) {
00309                 handleChangeSet(changeSet);
00310                 changeSet = null;
00311             } else if (change != null && qName.equals(change.getTagName())) {
00312                 if (textString != null) {
00313                     if (change instanceof RawSQLChange) {
00314                         ((RawSQLChange) change).setSql(textString);
00315                     } else if (change instanceof CreateProcedureChange) {
00316                         ((CreateProcedureChange) change).setProcedureBody(textString);
00317                     } else if (change instanceof CreateViewChange) {
00318                         ((CreateViewChange) change).setSelectQuery(textString);
00319                     } else if (change instanceof InsertDataChange) {
00320                         List<ColumnConfig> columns = ((InsertDataChange) change).getColumns();
00321                         columns.get(columns.size() - 1).setValue(textString);
00322                     } else if (change instanceof UpdateDataChange) {
00323                         List<ColumnConfig> columns = ((UpdateDataChange) change).getColumns();
00324                         columns.get(columns.size() - 1).setValue(textString);
00325                     } else {
00326                         throw new RuntimeException("Unexpected text in " + change.getTagName());
00327                     }
00328                 }
00329                 text = null;
00330                 if (inRollback) {
00331                     changeSet.addRollbackChange(change);
00332                 } else {
00333                     changeSet.addChange(change);
00334                 }
00335                 change = null;
00336             } else if (changeSet != null && "validCheckSum".equals(qName)) {
00337                 changeSet.addValidCheckSum(text.toString());
00338                 text = null;
00339             }
00340         } catch (Exception e) {
00341             log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error thrown as a SAXException: " + e.getMessage(), e);
00342             throw new SAXException(databaseChangeLog.getPhysicalFilePath() + ": " + e.getMessage(), e);
00343         }
00344     }
00345 
00346     protected String expandExpressions(String text) {
00347         if (text == null) {
00348             return null;
00349         }
00350         Pattern expressionPattern = Pattern.compile("(\\$\\{[^\\}]+\\})");
00351         Matcher matcher = expressionPattern.matcher(text);
00352         String originalText = text;
00353         while (matcher.find()) {
00354             String expressionString = originalText.substring(matcher.start(), matcher.end());
00355             String valueTolookup = expressionString.replaceFirst("\\$\\{", "").replaceFirst("\\}$", "");
00356 
00357             int dotIndex = valueTolookup.indexOf('.');
00358             Object value = getParameterValue(valueTolookup);
00359 
00360             if (value != null) {
00361                 text = text.replace(expressionString, value.toString());
00362             }
00363         }
00364         return text;
00365     }
00366 
00367     protected void handlePreCondition(@SuppressWarnings("unused")Precondition precondition) {
00368         databaseChangeLog.setPreconditions(rootPrecondition);
00369     }
00370 
00371     protected void handleChangeSet(ChangeSet changeSet) {
00372         databaseChangeLog.addChangeSet(changeSet);
00373     }
00374 
00375     public void characters(char ch[], int start, int length) throws SAXException {
00376         if (text != null) {
00377             text.append(new String(ch, start, length));
00378         }
00379     }
00380 
00381     public Object getParameterValue(String paramter) {
00382         return changeLogParameters.get(paramter);
00383     }
00384 
00385     public void setParameterValue(String paramter, Object value) {
00386         if (!changeLogParameters.containsKey(paramter)) {
00387             changeLogParameters.put(paramter, value);
00388         }
00389     }
00390 
00394     private class ExpandingAttributes implements Attributes {
00395         private Attributes attributes;
00396 
00397         private ExpandingAttributes(Attributes attributes) {
00398             this.attributes = attributes;
00399         }
00400 
00401         public int getLength() {
00402             return attributes.getLength();
00403         }
00404 
00405         public String getURI(int index) {
00406             return attributes.getURI(index);
00407         }
00408 
00409         public String getLocalName(int index) {
00410             return attributes.getLocalName(index);
00411         }
00412 
00413         public String getQName(int index) {
00414             return attributes.getQName(index);
00415         }
00416 
00417         public String getType(int index) {
00418             return attributes.getType(index);
00419         }
00420 
00421         public String getValue(int index) {
00422             return attributes.getValue(index);
00423         }
00424 
00425         public int getIndex(String uri, String localName) {
00426             return attributes.getIndex(uri, localName);
00427         }
00428 
00429         public int getIndex(String qName) {
00430             return attributes.getIndex(qName);
00431         }
00432 
00433         public String getType(String uri, String localName) {
00434             return attributes.getType(uri, localName);
00435         }
00436 
00437         public String getType(String qName) {
00438             return attributes.getType(qName);
00439         }
00440 
00441         public String getValue(String uri, String localName) {
00442             return expandExpressions(attributes.getValue(uri, localName));
00443         }
00444 
00445         public String getValue(String qName) {
00446             return expandExpressions(attributes.getValue(qName));
00447         }
00448     }
